about_the_game:
The Goodie Bag is a collection of additional goodies for Close Your Eyes, mainly made as a way for people who want to support the game to do so with a few extra incentives thrown in.

Includes:
  • Bonus 'Girl's Graveyard' mini-game storyline, with about 1-2 hours of its own unique arcade-like gameplay.
  • Artwork collection, including all the artwork used in the game, as well as some additional pieces and concept sketches.
  • The original soundtrack.

To access the Girl's Graveyard mini-game, enter the golden door to the left of the staircase by the Train Security Lock puzzle (shortly after the Hag section). To access the Artwork and Soundtrack, look for it in your Steamapps 'Close Your Eyes' folder.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

short_description: Featuring the new 'Girl's Graveyard' mini-game, a separate campaign lasting 1-2 hours, the Close Your Eyes soundtrack, and artwork collection.
